headline: Blink Charging, FuelCell Energy, First Solar, Nextracker, and EVgo Shares Plummet, What You Need To Know
summary: A number of stocks fell in the morning session after President Donald Trump announced his administration would not approve new solar or wind power projects, causing a sell-off in the renewable energy sector. The move came after President Donald Trump posted on his social media platform, Truth Social, that "We will not approve wind or farmer destroying Solar," adding, "The days of stupidity are over in the USA!!!" headline: Stocks to Watch Thursday: Meta, Coty, Walmart, Novo Nordisk
summary: ? Meta Platforms (META): The Facebook parent has frozen hiring in its artificial-intelligence division after spending months scooping up researchers and engineers, The Wall Street Journal reported. ↘️ Coty (COTY): The beauty and scents company posted a unexpected quarterly adjusted loss of 5 cents a share.
